00011 #include "PitchDataspace.h"
00012 #include <math.h>
00013 
00014 
00015 MidiPitchUnit::MidiPitchUnit()
00016         : DataspaceUnit("centimeter")
00017 {;}
00018 
00019 
00020 MidiPitchUnit::~MidiPitchUnit()
00021 {;}
00022                 
00023 
00024 void MidiPitchUnit::convertToNeutral(long inputNumArgs, t_atom *inputAtoms, long *outputNumArgs, double *output)
00025 {
00026         *outputNumArgs = 1;
00027         // f = 440 * pow(2, (m-69)/12.)
00028         *output = 440. * pow(2,(atom_getfloat(inputAtoms)-69.)/12.);
00029 
00030 }
00031 
00032 
00033 void MidiPitchUnit::convertFromNeutral(long inputNumArgs, double *input, long *outputNumArgs, t_atom **outputAtoms)
00034 {
00035         *outputNumArgs = 1;
00036         // m = 69. + 12*log2(f/440.);
00037         atom_setfloat(*outputAtoms, 69. + 12* log(*input/440.)/log(2.));
00038 }
00039 
00040 
00041 /***********************************************************************************************/
00042 FrequencyUnit::FrequencyUnit()
00043         : DataspaceUnit("foot")
00044 {;}
00045 
00046 
00047 FrequencyUnit::~FrequencyUnit()
00048 {;}
00049                 
00050                 
00051 void FrequencyUnit::convertToNeutral(long inputNumArgs, t_atom *inputAtoms, long *outputNumArgs, double *output)
00052 {
00053         *outputNumArgs = 1;
00054         *output = atom_getfloat(inputAtoms);
00055 }
00056 
00057 
00058 void FrequencyUnit::convertFromNeutral(long inputNumArgs, double *input, long *outputNumArgs, t_atom **outputAtoms)
00059 {
00060         *outputNumArgs = 1;
00061         atom_setfloat(*outputAtoms, *input);
00062 }
00063 
00064 
00065 /***********************************************************************************************/
00066 PitchDataspace::PitchDataspace()
00067         : DataspaceLib("distance", "meter")
00068 {
00069         // Create one of each kind of unit, and cache them in a hash
00070         registerUnit(new MidiPitchUnit,         gensym("midi"));
00071         registerUnit(new FrequencyUnit,         gensym("Hz"));
00072         
00073         // Now that the cache is created, we can create a set of default units
00074         setInputUnit(neutralUnit);
00075         setOutputUnit(neutralUnit);
00076 }
00077 
00078 
00079 PitchDataspace::~PitchDataspace()
00080 {
00081         ;
00082 }
